response.overview: August 5th, 2000 :: The first night of Pro Wrestling NOAH's Departure extravaganza took place on August 5, 2000 at the Tokyo Differ Ariake in Tokyo, Japan.  Matches include:  ⦁	Akira Taue & Mitsuharu Misawa vs Jun Akiyama & Kenta Kobashi  ⦁	Daisuke Ikeda, Masahito Kakihara & Yoshinari Ogawa vs No Fear (Satoru Asako, Takao Omori & Yoshihiro Takayama)  ⦁	Masao Inoue & Yoshinobu Kanemaru vs Kentaro Shiga & Naomichi Marufuji  ⦁	Takeshi Morishima vs Makoto Hashi  ⦁	Mitsuo Momota, Rusher Kimura & Takeshi Rikio vs Haruka Eigen, Jun Izumida & Tsuyoshi Kikuchi
response.title: NOAH: Departure 1st
